revised_title: Exploring Pen-Park-Hole: A Geological and Hydrological Study
tldr: This article describes the exploration of Pen-Park-Hole, a mysterious underground cavern in Gloucestershire. The author and his team conducted a detailed study of the cave, measuring its dimensions, examining its geological features, and analyzing the water quality. They discovered that the cave contains a large underground river and found evidence of a rich lead ore deposit. The author also debunks the myth of an evil spirit haunting the cave, as no such entity was observed during their exploration.
